spot check.translation[0].definitions[0]: an examination of a few things or people from a group, to check whether everything is correct or satisfactory
We carry out spot checks on the vehicles before they leave the depot.
spot check.translation[1].definitions[0]: a check on particular things or people from a group, done without warning
A spot check of 140 vehicles entering the car park revealed 18 people not wearing a seatbelt.
